column1: #Text=Ryu , he used to live in the basement , but then he got airbending , and he 's been doing important Air Nation stuff all over the world .
#Text=His father and I are here , visiting him and , we 're just having the best time in the big city , we 're so proud .
#Text=" Ryu 's father says : " Well , at least he has a job now .
#Text=" Ryu says : " Mom , Dad , I 'm trying to work !
